event.title: was run by Benjamin N. Sanders (postmaster March 2, 1904

data.event: Anna had its own post office that was run by Benjamin N. Sanders (postmaster March 2, 1904).
Modernized in 1956, the bridge runs over the Ichauway Nochaway Creek.
It was founded by Warren McDonald and built by Mood Richardson in 1884.

event.title: 1908 a second church building was constructed

data.event: In 1908 a second church building was constructed.

event.title: 1976 a third church building was erected

data.event: In 1976 a third church building was erected, where it now sits today.
In 1976 a third church building was erected, where it now sits today.
